issues.title: CoupledThermo canonical mass mode never activated

issues.title: TotalPrimaryMass_lb freezes after first step in Regime 2/3
issues.one_line_rca: Confirmed Ã¢â‚¬â€ Ledger was designed to be maintained by the solver in canonical mode. Canonical mode is never active (CS-0001), so no one updates the ledger after the initial rebase.

issues.title: Boundary flow accumulators never incremented

issues.title: Pre-solver V*rho PZR mass computation redundant with solver
issues.one_line_rca: Confirmed Ã¢â‚¬â€ v0.9.6 added pre-sync for solver input. In LEGACY mode, solver ignores PZR mass input and recomputes everything. Creates confusion about field ownership.

issues.title: CVCS double-count guard works by accident
issues.one_line_rca: Confirmed Ã¢â‚¬â€ v4.4.0 fix applied CVCS before solver to fix PZR level. Guard prevents double-counting. Architecturally correct in LEGACY mode but semantically wrong for canonical mode.
tags: Mass Conservation Ã¢â‚¬â€ Order of Operations
